title: Microsoft Defender Preview is now available for Windows and Android
content:
Microsoft has launched the new Microsoft Defender Preview app for both Android and Windows devices this week. Currently, the app is only available in the United States, but it will presumable be expanded to other regions as it gets more testing. Microsoft Defender is the company’s antimalware tool and it’s been available on Windows for

The post Microsoft Defender Preview is now available for Windows and Android appeared first on xda-developers.
description: A preview version of the Microsoft Defender antivirus is now available for Windows and Android devices in the United States,
